resources.string: Downloading pdf file from the server
On your device not installed the program supports the format of pdf, Lego instruction will be opened with the help of cloud service GoogleDrive.

Lego instructions stored on a server in PDF format.\n In your device installed Adobe Reader (or another program to view PDF files), instructions will be downloaded to your device when you open one by one.\n You can download all instructions (243 MB) by clicking the "Download"

Lego instructions stored on a server in PDF format.\n In your device does not have a program for reading PDF, instructions will be opened with a browser in the cloud service Google Drive.\n To be able to download instructions to the device memory, set the program to read PDF.
